body:
Well I made this threat to find out more about everyone and to let people find out about each other as-well ! This shouldn't be competitive so comment below how long you have been playing ! If you are new to Avicus then why not introduce your self on Avicus !

I have been playing for 2 years and a couple of months, I used to play on a different account in Mczone !

Comment Below...

title: How long have you been playing !

replies.body: Already a way to see in profiles.
replies.body_tagged: Already a way to see in profiles.

replies.body: You can already check how long someone has been playing on their profile, like stated above; therefore, I'm going to go ahead and lock this topic.
